reviewText: Except played straight instead of for laughs. Here's the plot summary from the back cover - you be the judge: "At a private party, four childhood friends get together for what appears to be a bachelor's party. Suddenly, one of the hired prostitutes falls dead. The four friends become desperate - married, they have social positions to defend and this situation could mean ruin for each and every one of them. Locked in an apartment they have to find the hidden truth - Why did she die? Or was she murdered? One of them has reasons to cause such a dilemma...a psychological drama which is up to you to resolve."
